text: Allen Michael Chastanet (born 1960/1961) is a Saint Lucian businessman and politician. He was the Prime Minister of Saint Lucia from 2016 to 2021. He is currently the Opposition Leader of Saint Lucia since 2021. He os the political leader of the United Workers Party. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:North American businesspeople Category:Opposition leaders Category:Prime Ministers of Saint Lucia
title: Allen Chastanet
